Class Permissions.BlacklistCommands

Represents owner only blacklist commands for managing user, channel, and server blacklists.

Represents owner only blacklist commands for managing user, channel, and server blacklists.

Type Name Description
IBotCredentials creds

Bot credentials

Methods

| Edit this page View Source

ChannelBlacklist(AddRemove, ulong, string?)

Blacklists or unblacklists a channel by its ID, with an optional reason.

Declaration
[Cmd("ChannelBlacklist")]
[Aliases("ChannelBlacklist")]
public Task ChannelBlacklist(AddRemove action, ulong id, string? reason)
Parameters
Type Name Description
AddRemove action

Specifies whether to add or remove from the blacklist.
ulong id

The channel's ID.
string reason

The reason for the blacklist operation.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation.
Examples

.blacklist add channel 123456789012345678 Reason for blacklisting .blacklist rem channel 123456789012345678

| Edit this page View Source

ServerBlacklist(AddRemove, IGuild, string?)

Blacklists or unblacklists a server by its guild object, with an optional reason.

Declaration
[Cmd("ServerBlacklist")]
[Aliases("ServerBlacklist")]
public Task ServerBlacklist(AddRemove action, IGuild guild, string? reason)
Parameters
Type Name Description
AddRemove action

Specifies whether to add or remove from the blacklist.
IGuild guild

The guild object.
string reason

The reason for the blacklist operation.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation.
Examples

.blacklist add server @Server Reason for blacklisting .blacklist rem server @Server
